title: [API]SuperCoreAPI —— 一款人性化的前置API[1.8-1.16.1]
author: PaulWong
txt_content:
本帖最后由 egqwea231 于 2020-9-7 17:09 编辑 

SuperCoreAPI
概述|新的api|可以作为插件的api|很无情┃ 简介1.这是最新型的API2.准确来说他是个api包不是插件3.可以引用这个api去开发很多的插件4.这个API包支持bungeecord插件开发
┃ 用法用法在这个链接 是英文的 可能需要一些英语基础 WIKI链接
┃ 使用API这插件就是个API 没有使不使用的事
┃ 兼容性/注意事项/更新日志 这是个api不是插件 放到插件文件夹也没用 我问过作者了
更新日志可能有点长
Bug Fixes and new Things
Sorry for the late update but I was working on other plugins

Changes:
* Bug Fixes
* New Translations
* New Utils
* And more
v3.0.1 - ReCode Update + Improvements
Change log:

• Code Improvement
• Added TranslationDownloader
• Added BungeeConsole
• Added BungeeCommand

Click to Full Description
v3.0.2 - Code Improvements • Bug Fixes • New addons
Change Log:
Code ImprovementFixed B、；ugsAdded Messaging Services (Not tested yet)
Links:
GitHubJenkins

v3.1.0 - DataBase Storage • Dependency Manager • Code Improvements
Change log:
• Code Improvement
• Fixed bugs
• Added MySQL and SQLite Support
• Added Dependency Manager
v3.1.1 - Dependency Manager • JavaDocs • Fixes
ChangeLog:
• Fixed Dependency Manager
• Reduced jar file size
• Added JavaDocs
• Bug Fixes
v3.2.0 - Added Memory and Global Storage
Change Log:
• Added Memory Storage (Erased on every start)
• Added Global Storage (Support BungeeCord and Spigot)
v3.2.1 - Translation Fixes
ChangeLog:
• Fixes with translations
v3.2.2 - GUI Update
ChangeLog:
• Added option to keep GUI opened (Not tested yet)
v3.2.3 - Small Fix
Change Log:
• Small fix with MemoryStorage
v3.2.4 - Memory Storage Additions
Change Log:
• Added getter methods to MemoryStorage
v3.2.5 - Emergency Stop System
Change Log:
• Working on Emergency Stop System
v3.2.6 - Bug Fixes
Change log:
• Now some things can work because I forgot to initialize the EventManager
v3.2.7 - Messaging Service Fixes
Change log:
• Working on Messaging Services Fixes
v3.2.8 - Bug Fixes
Change log:
• Fixed Issue while registering channel for Messaging Services (Usage of the util still need testing)
v3.2.9 - Bug fixes
Change log:

• Fixed error while disabling plugin with custom commands
v3.3.0 - Bug Fix
Change log:
• Fixed bug with GUI and BrowserGUI being registered 2 times as listeners
v3.3.1 - Logs Filter and PreCreated GUIs
Change log:
+ Added LogsFilter
+ Added PreCreated GUIs
• Added More Translations
v3.3.2 - Fixes
Change log:
• Added a way to register the LogsFilter
• Added option to hide or not hide the HikariCP Logs
• Updated Spigot NMS Repo



v3.4.0 - New Features • Removed Messaging Service • Fixes
Change log:
• Removed Messaging Service due to multiple bugs
• Added SongodaUpdateChecker and SpigotUpdateChecker
• Added Extra Requirements for Logs Filter
v3.5.0 - Bug Fixes • New Features • Improvements
Change Log:
• Changed way to close dialogs
• Added Plugin Data Storage
• Added Notifications
• Bug Fixes
v3.6.0 - New Features • Improvement • Fixes
Change Log:
• Added GUICloseEvent and GUIOpenEvent
• Fixed item flags not working
v3.6.1 - Fixes and Improvements
Change Log:
+ Added GetExtraButtons method to GUI
- Removed AddButton and RemoveButton Methods from GUI
v3.6.2 - Fixes • Working on Stats Service
Change Log:
+ Added Stats ID to PluginDataStorage
• Working on future Stats Service
v3.6.3 - New Features • Improvements • Fixes
Change Log:
+ Added SkinTexture Head DataBase
+ Added SuperCoreAPI Update Checker
• Improvements
• Bug Fixes


v4.2.4 | New Error List
Changelog:
+ Added a list to save the last errors
v4.2.5 | Added new method
Changelog:
+ Added method to add an error to the list of the last errors

1.16 Update • Custom Recipes • Less Lag
Change Log:
+ Added Custom Recipes
+ Added Custom Tasks
+ Added Item Utils
- Removed TimerEvent
• Update to 1.16
• Code Improvement
• Bug Fixes
v4.1.0 - Code Improvements • Bug Fixes
+ Re-Added TimerEvent
* Code Improvements
* Bug Fixes


A detailed changelog can be found Here
v4.1.1 - Hex Parser • Improvements • Fixes
Changelog:
+ Added HexColor Parser in SuperUtils
* Bug Fixes with GUI not being closed if GUI#canCloseGUI is disabled
* Changed GUI Update from 5 Ticks to 2 Ticks
v4.2.3 | New Utils
Changelog:
+ Added method to build an Exception into a String
+ Added method to upload data to https://paste.theprogramsrc.xyz/
+ Added method to validate JSON string
v4.2.2 | API Update Checker • Error Fixes
Changelog:
+ Added SuperCoreAPI Update Checker
+ Now the API can be added as jar file to the plugins folder
* Fixes with Songoda Update Checker




Likev4.2.1 | New MojangAPI Check
Changelog:
+ Now the API check if the MojangAPI (https://sessionserver.mojang.com) is down.


t
Likev4.2.0 | Improvements • Fixes
Changelog:
* Code Improvement
* SkinTexture Error Fixest


Likev4.1.3 | Error Fix
Changelog:
* Fixed a error that throws an Exception every time that you try to check the SkinTexture and the server doesn't give a response.
